Articles.Content:
At long last, I scored my 1st interplanetary return chevron! I've stranded missions at Duna before, but finally was able to bring the crew back. I did it by sending two craft: an orbiter and a lander.

Here's the orbiter:

Here's the lander:

Wehrke Kerman was the lander pilot. Here he is on Duna:

After rendezvous with the orbiter, Wehrke joined the rest of the team in the orbiter and headed home:

After catching a nice deceleration from Mun, the crew settled into a 90k orbit. I sent an SSTO up to the orbiter and brought the new hero Wehrke back to Kerbin:

Let the parades commence!

great stuff. big achievement there! i've been mechjebbing around stranding Kermen around the system but not successfully manually landed anywhere outside the Kerbin moons yet myself.

Wehrke sure looks proud on that Duna surface pic!
